name: There's No Brakes!
description:
There's No Brakes! is a simple-ish top-down 2D racing game (well... there's no competition so would you really call it a race?) where you run three laps around a track dodging bananas, picking up tanks, and boosting your way to the finish, all while you slide around the track without the ability to brake! The game currently has a tutorial and four tracks to slip and slide through.

This game was made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3. (Note - Game does not incorporate theme. sorry.)

This was my first Jam, and my first game. I really enjoyed it and would definitely participate in the next! (And actually do the theme.)

Nokia Cellphone FC Font by Zeh Fernando (Used in the Tutorial)
